aiPluginUtterances.utterance: Please provide list of all open cases.

GenAiPlugin.description: This topic handles requests for listing all new or escalated cases associated with a specific contact.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the user provides a contact ID, use it to retrieve the list of new or escalated cases.
If the user does not provide a contact ID, ask for it before proceeding.
Ensure to verify the contact's identity before providing any case details.

When listing the cases, include the case ID, Case number, status, priority, and a brief description of each case. Also, begin the response with the following line: 'Here are the new or escalated cases related to the selected contact:'"

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is only to provide a list of all new or escalated cases for a given contact. Do not attempt to handle other types of inquiries or actions.
